common_1180_friend_18:
And it’s pretty obvious they’re not here to roll
out a friendly welcome mat.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1180_botan_01: There’s no way we can handle this many![VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1180_botan_02a: And don’t tell me...they’re all ancient Pokémon?![VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1180_botan_02b: And don’t tell me...they’re all future Pokémon?![VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1180_friend_00: We’ve got a little disaster on our hands here...[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1180_friend_01: Look, even that fellow’s ready to bail...[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1180_rival_01: Then I guess it’s my turn! I’ve been waitin’![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1180_rival_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]C’mon, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Let’s do this
together![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1180_rival_03:
Wow, they’re strong! Now THIS is a
worthwhile challenge![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1180_botan_03:
I’m glad you’re on our side, but you’re still
REALLY annoying when you say stuff like that![VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1180_botan_04: Gyah! Why’re they coming at ME?![VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1180_botan_06a: Guh. The ancient past must’ve been terrifying...[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1180_botan_06b: Guh. The future must be terrifying...[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1180_rival_05:
If those Pokémon get out, we’re gonna have
a gigantic mess on our hands!\c
We gotta go after ’em, Penny![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_1180_botan_10:
Gah! Hold on, Nemona—and why do I get the
feeling you’re enjoying all this?![VAR 0114(0008)]
common_1180_friend_02: I hope the two of them can handle their part...[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1180_friend_03:
But at least the crowd’s been thinned out now.
Guess it’s up to us to deal with what’s left![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1180_friend_04: Let’s go for this strong-looking one first![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1180_friend_05:
See! The power of friendship had us perfectly
in sync! All thanks to our Titan hunting together![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1180_friend_06:
Still scared, huh? You worried you might have to
face that other one of your kind?[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1180_friend_07: Well then, lemme take on some of the burden![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1180_friend_08:
These stragglers should be nothing! Me and
Mabosstiff here can take them![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1180_friend_09:
[VAR BD06(0000)]So, [VAR TRNAME(0000)], you take your
partner\r
there\r
and\r
go\r
take\r
care\r
of business![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1180_friend_10:
Heheh, glad to see you’ve got some faith in us
at last!\c
Mabosstiff can’t wait to battle, either![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1180_friend_11:
Aw, come on! If you’re not even gonna rely on
your friends, then who are you going to rely on?\r
Mabosstiff here is raring to go! Leave this to us![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1180_friend_13: You really ruined my whole childhood, you know.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1180_friend_14:
But it’s not like seeing you cowering and scared
outta your wits makes me feel any better about it.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1180_friend_15:
You’ve got amazing powers, if you just use ’em!
And you’ve got us, too! So... So...\c
So don’t you even think about losing to that jerk![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_1180_friend_17:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Go, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
We’ll\r
follow\r
as\r
soon\r
as\r
we can![VAR 0114(0006)]
